_assets.title: Class 2 Drug Alert (Action Within 48 Hours): Vimpat 150mg Tablets - Lacosamide - OPD Laboratories Limited - EL (13)A/01 (52Kb)

body:
## DRUG ALERT

CLASS 2 MEDICINES RECALL

Action within 48 hours

  


Pharmacy, Clinic and Wholesaler  level recall  
  
08 January 2013  |   |  EL (13)A/01  |   |  Our ref:  MDR 03-01/13   | 

* * *

Dear Healthcare Professional,

OPD Laboratories Limited

Vimpat 150mg Tablets

(Lacosamide)

EU/1/08/470/008

  
  
  
Batch number  |   |  Expiry date  |   |  Pack size  |   |  First distributed  |   
8351104/4  |   |  January 2015  |   |  56 tablets  |   |  11 October 2012  | 

OPD Laboratories Ltd are recalling all remaining packs of the above batch of this parallel distributed product due to a labelling error. The blister strips are incorrectly labelled as 50mg but the cartons are correctly labelled as 150mg.

Any remaining stock of this batch should be quarantined and returned to the original supplier for credit. For enquiries relating to stock returns, please call Mr Anthony Joseph on 01923 332746.

For medical information enquiries, please call Mrs Gail Friend on 01923 332796.

Recipients of this Drug Alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter. Primary care trusts are asked to forward this to relevant clinics and to general practitioners and community pharmacists for information.

Yours faithfully  
  
Ian Holloway  
DMRC Manager

MHRA Distribution (further recipients by cascade):  Regional contacts for NHS trusts and provider units  
Chief pharmacists: England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland  
Prison health policy unit (DH)  
Chief pharmacists:  Jersey, Guernsey, Alderney, Sark, Isle of Man, Gibraltar  
Special hospitals  
Healthcare commission for distribution to independent health care establishments  
Primary care trusts (England) 

### Download documents:  
  
  * [ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0)
